AtlasInterface.name: IA6 Health Analysis

Component.name: Data Explorer
Component.Description: Allows the end user to select a indicator.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(dataExplorer)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Hide the explorer on a selection?
Property.name: Hide On Selection?

Property.description: Should dates be displayed?
Property.name: Show Dates?

Property.description: Should dates be reversed?
Property.name: Reverse Dates?

Property.description: When dates are not displayed load the most recent date on a selection?
Property.name: Load Most Recent Date On Selection?

Property.description: Should non-selected explorer branches be closed when a new one is opened?
Property.name: Close Explorer Branches On Selection?

Component.name: Dimensions Explorer
Component.classes: ia-panel ia-panel-header ia-dimension ia-dimension-section ia-dimension-reset-button ia-select-label ia-select
Component.Description: Dimensions Explorer.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(dimensionsExplorer)' to toggle visibility.

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: A list of indicator properties to include
Property.name: Indicator Properties

Property.description: A list of indicator properties to render as checkboxes
Property.name: Use Checkboxes

Property.description: The indicator text
Property.name: Indicator Text

Property.description: The reset button text
Property.name: Reset Text

Property.description: The no selection text
Property.name: No Selection Text

Component.name: Filter Explorer

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Hide the explorer on a selection?
Property.name: Hide On Selection?

Property.description: Should non-selected explorer branches be closed when a new one is opened?
Property.name: Close Explorer Branches On Selection?

Property.description: The filter type
Property.name: Filter Type

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside

Component.name: Time Series Control
Component.Description: Runs an animation that loops through the time series data for the selected indicator.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(timeControl)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: The time delay in seconds between changing dates
Property.name: Time Delay In Seconds

Property.description: The text that appears when the time data is unavailable
Property.name: Not Available Text

Property.description: A list of dates to ignore
Property.name: List Of Dates To Ignore

Component.classes: ia-panel ia-panel-header ia-map-toolbar ia-google-map-toolbar ia-map-labels ia-map-copyright ia-map-selection-opacity ia-map-highlight-opacity
Component.name: Map
Component.Description: Displays a thematic map of the selected indicator alongside any support and background layers.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(map)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Can it be exported to an image?
Property.name: Exportable?

Property.description: Any map copyright text
Property.name: Map Copyright

Property.description: The path to any background images
Property.name: Background Folder

Property.description: The maximum map zoom in map units (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:500000, Min Zoom Allowed:10000000). When using google maps use zoom levels 0 - 21 (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:15, Min Zoom Allowed:5)
Property.name: Max Zoom Allowed

Property.description: The minimum map zoom in map units (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:500000, Min Zoom Allowed:10000000). When using google maps use zoom levels 0 - 21 (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:15, Min Zoom Allowed:5)
Property.name: Min Zoom Allowed

Property.description: The data tip
Property.name: Tip

Property.description: The clear button text - leave empty to remove button
Property.name: Clear Button Text

Property.description: The filter button text - leave empty to remove button
Property.name: Filter Button Text

Property.description: Google maps toolbar 'Greyscale' text
Property.name: Google Greyscale Text

Property.description: Google maps toolbar 'Off' text
Property.name: Google Off Text

Property.description: Include the search tool
Property.name: Include Search Tool?

Property.description: Zoom to areas when filter is applied
Property.name: Zoom On Filter?

Property.description: Execute an action when a user clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Click Action

Property.description: Execute an action when a user double clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Double Click Action

Component.classes: ia-panel ia-panel-header ia-feature-card ia-feature-card-header ia-feature-card-sub-header ia-feature-card-content
Component.name: Feature Card
Component.Description: A graphically rich, highly customizable component that can be used to build up area profiles.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(featureCard)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.choices: Order data by feature;Order data by indicator
Property.description: Should the data be ordered by feature or by indicator?
Property.name: Data Order

Property.choices: All themes;Selected theme only;Selected indicator only
Property.description: Which data should be displayed
Property.name: Display Mode?

Property.description: Display indicators with selected date only
Property.name: Display Selected Date Only?

Property.description: Display the main header (The feature name when ordered by feature. The theme name when ordered by indicator)
Property.name: Display Main Header?

Property.description: Display the sub header (The theme name when ordered by feature. The indicator name when ordered by indicator)
Property.name: Display Sub Header?

Property.description: A list of theme ids to ignore?
Property.name: List Of Themes To Ignore

Property.description: A list of indicator ids to ignore?
Property.name: List Of Indicators To Ignore

Property.description: A html code snippet used to render each row of data
Property.name: HTML snippet

Component.name: Box And Whisker Chart
Component.Description: Displays the minimum, maximum, lower quartile, upper quartile and median for each feature.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(boxAndWhisker)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Can it be exported to an image?
Property.name: Exportable?

Property.description: The data tip
Property.name: Tip

Property.description: The data containing the largest observation
Property.name: Largest Observation Data

Property.description: The data containing the upper quartile
Property.name: Upper Quartile Data

Property.description: The data containing the median
Property.name: Median Data

Property.description: The data containing the lower quartile
Property.name: Lower Quartile Data

Property.description: The data containing the smallest observation
Property.name: Lowest Observation Data

Property.description: Should the comparison data be displayed if available?
Property.name: Always Show Comparison Data

Property.description: The orientation of the chart
Property.name: Orientation

Property.description: The sort direction of the data
Property.name: Sort Direction

Property.description: The text that appears when the chart data is unavailable
Property.name: Not Available Text

Property.description: Should the chart data be constrained to the current data range?
Property.name: Match Axis to Data?

Property.description: The label for the x-axis
Property.name: X-Axis Label

Property.description: The label for the y-axis
Property.name: Y-Axis Label

Property.description: Use the fixed values for the chart data axis?
Property.name: Use Fixed Values?

Property.description: A fixed minimum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Minimum Value

Property.description: A fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Value

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed minimum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Minimum Axis Value Property

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Axis Value Property

Component.name: Radar Chart
Component.Description: Displays multivariate data in the form of a two-dimensional chart of three or more indicators represented on axes starting from the same point. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.

Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(radarChart)' to toggle visibility.

Property.description: The z-index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside

Property.name: Always Show Comparison Data

Property.name: Tip

Property.description: The text that appears when the chart data is unavailable

Property.description: The size of the data point markers
Property.name: Marker Size

Property.description: The space around the radar reserved for the labels
Property.name: Padding

Property.description: Should the chart data be constrained to the current data range?
Property.name: Match Axis to Data?

Property.description: Should the chart data be constrained to the selected features?
Property.name: Match Axis to Selected Features?

Property.description: Should the chart axis start from zero?
Property.name: Start Axis From Zero?

Property.description: Use the fixed values for the chart data axis?
Property.name: Use Fixed Values?

Property.description: A fixed minimum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Minimum Value

Property.description: A fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Value

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed minimum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Minimum Axis Value Property

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Axis Value Property

Component.name: Bar Chart
Component.Description: For numeric indicators displays a bar for each feature in ascending or descending order. For categoric indicators each bar represents the number of features in each of the map legend classes.

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(barChart)' to toggle visibility.

Property.description: The z-index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Can it be exported to an image?
Property.name: Exportable?

Property.description: The data for the chart. Used to set bar heights. Bar colours are set by the legend
Property.name: Data

Property.name: Tip

Property.name: Always Show Comparison Data

Property.description: The orientation of the chart
Property.name: Orientation

Property.description: The sort direction of the data
Property.name: Sort Direction

Property.description: Should the chart data be constrained to the current data range?
Property.name: Match Axis to Data?

Property.description: Should the chart bars be drawn from zero?
Property.name: Draw bars from zero?

Property.description: The label for the x-axis
Property.name: X-Axis Label

Property.description: The label for the y-axis
Property.name: Y-Axis Label

Property.description: Use the fixed values for the chart data axis?

Property.name: Fixed Minimum Value

Property.description: A fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Value

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed minimum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Minimum Axis Value Property

Property.description: A custom property containing a fixed maximum value for the chart data axis
Property.name: Fixed Maximum Axis Value Property

Property.description: The legend breaks - a semi-colon delimited list of values of the form '0;10;20;30'

Property.description: The legend labels - a semi-colon delimited list of labels of the form 'low;medium;high'. Relies on 'Legend Breaks' being set
Property.name: Map Legend Labels

Property.description: The custom classifier property value contains one of 'equalInterval', 'quantile', 'natural', 'continuous' or 'standardDeviation'
Property.name: Custom Classifier Property Id

Property.description: The custom colours property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of colours of the form '#ffff00;rgb(155,234,100);#0000ff'
Property.name: Custom Colours Property Id

Property.description: The custom breaks property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of values of the form '0;10;20;80'
Property.name: Custom Breaks Property Id

Property.description: The custom labels property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of labels of the form 'high;medium;low'
Property.name: Custom Labels Property Id

Property.description: The custom palette property value contains a reference to a palettes name.
